LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.label: psychite refining
LanguageData.PsychiteRefining.description: Learn to refine psychoid leaves into flake and yayo, different forms of the euphoric drug psychite.
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.label: wake-up production
LanguageData.WakeUpProduction.description: Your chemists learn the formulas and techniques for synthesizing wake-up, a work performance-enhancing drug.
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.label: go-juice production
LanguageData.GoJuiceProduction.description: Learn to produce the synthetic combat-performance-enhancing drug go-juice.
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.label: penoxycyline production
LanguageData.PenoxycylineProduction.description: Learn to produce penoxycline, a disease prevention drug.
LanguageData.LongBlades.label: long blades
LanguageData.Greatbows.label: greatbows
LanguageData.Batteries.label: batteries
LanguageData.Refining.label: refining
LanguageData.Refining.description: Build refineries to make chemfuel from wood.
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.label: nutrient paste
LanguageData.NutrientPaste.description: Build nutrient paste dispensers which efficiently produce edible meals from raw nutritive feedstocks.
LanguageData.SolarPanels.label: solar panels
LanguageData.SolarPanels.description: Build solar panels for electrical generation.
LanguageData.AirConditioning.label: air conditioning
LanguageData.AirConditioning.description: Build air conditions to cool rooms in the heat, or to keep freezers.
LanguageData.Autodoors.label: autodoors
LanguageData.Autodoors.description: Build autodoors which open to permit movement without slowing anyone down.
LanguageData.Hydroponics.label: hydroponics
LanguageData.Hydroponics.description: Allows you to build hydroponics basins to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside.
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.label: electric smelting
LanguageData.ElectricSmelting.description: Build electric smithy and smelters.\n\nThe electric smithy allows smithing items without fuel. The electric smelters uses heat and strong electromagnets to extract useful metal from slag chunks and other items.
LanguageData.PackagedSurvivalMeal.label: packaged survival meal
LanguageData.PackagedSurvivalMeal.description: Learn to produce packaged survival meals, a preserved and sealed food that never goes bad. Great for traveling.
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.label: electric cremation
LanguageData.ElectricCremation.description: Build crematoriums which can vaporize unwanted corpses.
LanguageData.ColoredLights.label: colored lights
LanguageData.ColoredLights.description: Allows colonists to construct colored lights for decorative purposes.
LanguageData.Machining.label: machining
LanguageData.Machining.description: Build machining tables to craft guns and machinery or disassemble dead mechanoids.
LanguageData.IEDs.label: IEDs
LanguageData.IEDs.description: Allows colonists to build improvised traps from explosive, EMP, firefoam, and antigrain warhead mortar shells.
LanguageData.IEDIncendiary.label: incendiary IEDs
LanguageData.IEDIncendiary.description: Allows colonists to build incendiary explosive traps from mortar shells.
LanguageData.Mortars.label: mortars
LanguageData.Mortars.description: Learn to build mortars which can lob shells long distances over walls.
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.label: gunsmithing
LanguageData.Gunsmithing.description: Craft simple manually operated guns like revolvers, pump shotguns, bolt-action rifles, and incendiary launchers.
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.label: blowback operation
LanguageData.BlowbackOperation.description: Craft simple semi-automatic and automatic guns like autopistols, machine pistols, and heavy SMGs.
LanguageData.GasOperation.label: gas operation
LanguageData.GasOperation.description: Craft more advanced semi-automatic and automatic guns like chain shotguns and LMGs.
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.label: precision rifling
LanguageData.PrecisionRifling.description: Craft assault rifles and sniper rifles.
LanguageData.SmokepopBelt.label: smokepop belts
LanguageData.SmokepopBelt.description: Learn to build smokepop belts which can provide an automatic defensive smokescreen.
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.label: microelectronics basics
LanguageData.MicroelectronicsBasics.description: The basics of working with delicate, complex electronics. This unlocks the high-tech research bench, comms console, and other research projects like tube televisions, and cryptosleep caskets.
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.label: tube television
LanguageData.TubeTelevision.description: Allows the production of tube televisions.
LanguageData.GunTurrets.label: gun turrets
LanguageData.GunTurrets.description: Allows the production of automated gun turrets.
